advanced_add_checkbox_tooltip.message: Allows users to add secrets via QR code (webcam, file, or link).

are_you_sure_message.message: Are you sure? This action is permanent.

autofill_checkbox_tooltip.message: Automatically fills the OTP field using the Autofill URL for each token.

camera_permission_message_2.message: Webcam Button will work after allowing camera access

clipboard_copying_checkbox_tooltip.message: Allows copying the OTP to clipboard when clicking a token box.

enter_name_and_secret_message.message: Please enter both name and secret.

extension_description.message: Authenticator Pro is a powerful tool that generates a One-Time Password (OTP) every 30 seconds based on a provided secret.

hide_token_adder_checkbox_tooltip.message: Hides the token adder form; provides easier visibility of saved tokens.

incorrect_url_message.message: Incorrect URL, or URL did not contain QR code.

invalid_secret_message.message: Invalid secret. Please enter a Base32 encoded string.

name_already_exists_message.message: A token with this name already exists.

name_too_long_message.message: Name too long, please input a shorter name.

online_time_checkbox_tooltip.message: Syncs with time online for accuracy; otherwise uses local device time.

password_protected_checkbox_message.message: To enable, turn off Sync Across Chrome

password_protected_checkbox_tooltip.message: Encrypts and protects saved secrets with a password.

password_warning_message.message: WARNING: If the password is forgotten, it cannot be recovered.

popup_mode_tooltip.message: Opens Authenticator Pro in a separate window.

qr_not_found_message.message: QR Code not found. Try a different image.

sync_checkbox_message.message: To enable, turn off Password Protection

sync_checkbox_tooltip.message: Syncs tokens on logged-in Chrome devices; otherwise, state is only local.
